title: Client download insanely slow
body: Just bought a new MacBook Pro yesterday and started the client download last night, just got home from work and it's only downloaded about 20% and is currently downloading at 4 KBps... This is insanely slow, my internet is much quicker than this. Any tips ?

replies.body: As long as you aren't receiving any errors, I'd leave it alone!  It could take a few moments for files to scan, download, and update.  Hang tight!
